courseSectionInformation: Prerequisite: Admission to graduate program in community health or the MBA Administration Program; CHLH 429; or consent of instructor.
description: Comprehensive analysis of the policy process in health care in the United States; systematic and critical review of health policy development, implementation, and evaluation; impact of government at all levels and the role of providers, industry, labor, and consumer in health policy. Prerequisite: Admission to graduate program in community health or the MBA Administration Program; CHLH 429; or consent of instructor.
label: Health Policy: United States
